title: Work Experience!!!
body: Hi i am a student of GRC Huntsville in Sydney and as part of our careers regulations i have to participate in work experience for a set amount of time.(Decided by the place your working at) I am in year 10 and i have some background on coding languages like java, python, c, c++ and HTML. I live close to the office and i would love to come in if it is to watch, shadow or help someone. I can be a coffee boy and helper.  This will be extremely beneficial to me and i am a HUGE fan of league of legends and i have spent over $400 over this game. Please reply soon. Dont worry im Patient {{summoner:13}}
